# a [[railway]] [[car]] carrying a large [[vat]] or [[barrel]] used to transport [[liquid]]
types.html:
wagon-foudre m (plural wagons-foudres)

  1. a railway car carrying a large vat or barrel used to transport liquid
trans: a railway car carrying a large vat or barrel used to transport liquid
